events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your experience and skills.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our technical team.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening interview and found your background closely matches what we are looking for in a Software Engineer.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the next steps in the recruitment process. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th, where you will discuss your development experience and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview concluded successfully. You demonstrated strong coding skills and a clear understanding of software engineering principles.
We have arranged an HR interview to discuss your role fit, company culture, and any additional questions you might have.
The HR interview went well, and the feedback indicates you are a strong candidate aligned with our values and team environment.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer. Details have been sent to your email.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement about the prospect of joining our company.
You have accepted the offer. Welcome aboard! We look forward to your contributions to our software engineering projects.
Your onboarding process has begun. We have shared all necessary documentation and your orientation schedule to ensure a smooth start.
The hiring process is now officially complete. You are fully onboarded, and your team is ready to welcome you to your new role.
